value.title: Pandemic speeds labour shift from humans to robots, WEF survey finds
value.excerpt: Robots will destroy 85 million jobs at mid-sized to large businesses over the next five years as the COVID-19 pandemic accelerates changes in the workplace likely to exaggerate inequalities, a World Economic Forum (WEF) study has found.

value.title: ONR Robotics enter the COVID-19 fight
